```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)

library(lubridate)
library(plotly)
library(patchwork)
```

```{r}
world_env <- read_csv("world_env_vars.csv") %>% 
  clean_names() 

world_env_pca <- world_env %>% 
  select(accessibility_to_cities, cropland_cover, tree_canopy_cover, temp_mean_annual) %>% 
  rename(Accessibility.to.Cities = accessibility_to_cities,
        Cropland.Cover = cropland_cover,
         Tree.Canopy.Cover = tree_canopy_cover ,
         Annual.Mean.Temp = temp_mean_annual ) %>% 
  drop_na() %>% 
  scale() %>% 
  prcomp()

world_env_u <- world_env %>% 
  drop_na(accessibility_to_cities, cropland_cover, tree_canopy_cover, temp_mean_annual) %>% 
  rename(Accessibility.to.Cities = accessibility_to_cities,
        Cropland.Cover = cropland_cover,
         Tree.Canopy.Cover = tree_canopy_cover ,
         Annual.Mean.Temp = temp_mean_annual )

world_env_pca$rotation

autoplot(world_env_pca,
         data = world_env_u,
         #shape = FALSE,
         loadings = TRUE,
         colour = 'country',
         loadings.label = TRUE,
         loadings.colour = "black",
         loadings.label.colour = "black",
         loadings.label.vjust = -1.1,
         loadings.label.hjust = 0.8,
         loadings.label.size  = 4,
         loadings.label.face = "bold"
         ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "none") +
  labs(caption = "Figure 1. PCA biplot comparing the relationships between Cropland cover, tree canopy \ncover, access to cities and annual mean temperature around the world.") +
  theme(plot.caption = element_text(hjust = 0, size = 10, face = "bold"))

```
